##1. Lobster abundance and fishing pressure


```{r}
#exploratory graphs relating size and count to site and date/ year
#Considering changing names of months and sites
ggplot(lobster, aes(x = COUNT, y = SITE ))+
  geom_point(color = "blue")

ggplot(lobster, aes(x = MONTH, y = COUNT ))+
  geom_col()

ggplot(lobster, aes(x = SITE, y = COUNT))+
  geom_col()

ggplot(lobster, aes(x = SITE, y = SIZE))+
  geom_col()

```
